list.title: answer
list.description: This function is triggered when an answer is received.

list.title: candidate
list.description: Function is triggered when it receives an ice candidate.

list.title: disconnect
list.description: This function is triggered when a user is disconnected.

list.title: offer
list.description: This function is triggered when an offer is received.

list.title: ready
list.description: This function is triggered when a person joins the room and is ready to communicate.

list.title: iceServers
list.description: Contains the stun server URL that will be used

list.title: onAddStream
list.description: Implements the onAddStrean function that takes an event as an input

list.title: onGestureAction
list.description: Function is triggered when a gesture is recognized.

list.title: onIceCandidate
list.description: Implements the onIceCandidate function which is part of RTCPeerConnection
